text: Adam Berry (born December 3, 1966) is a two-time Emmy Award-winning television and movie composer. He is also a Grammy Award-winning producer and member of the new age band White Sun. He is originally from Los Angeles. ==Works== Some of his credits include South Park, Kim Possible, and The Sarah Silverman Program. He worked closely with Trey Parker and Matt Stone's in developing the scores for the first four seasons of South Park. He also played in their punk band, DVDA. As a member of new age band White Sun, Berry garnered a Grammy Award for best New Age album in 2017 for the album White Sun II.
